title: [CLIENT] Karthus Postgame Picture is Aatrox

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I don't know this is a bug but I'm sure it is. After I finished a game of Karthus a picture of Aatrox appeared and I thought that It was supposed to display art of the champion.  Correct me if I'm wrong.

Thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Haha, hey! You're definitely right on this one! This is a legacy issue that we're aware of, but basically what happens is, there's a connection error finding the proper splash, and since Aatrox is the first splash in the folder, it defaults to that. ;_;
